job_tasks.phrase: Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of creating and implementing backend services, which is a core component of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
job_tasks.justification: This describes designing and optimizing software architecture, including APIs and cloud services, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'DevOps setup,' 'streamlining deployments,' 'monitoring systems,' and 'CI/CD workflows,' all of which are key aspects of Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in strategic planning ('technical roadmaps') and shaping the future of the product, which requires understanding business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights responsibilities related to monitoring, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring system reliability, which are operations-focused tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with the CTO and other engineers
Bring your ideas and those of your team to life

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software development and DevOps integration, with only a mention of 'LLM providers' in the tech stack. There is no evidence of core GenAI Engineer responsibilities like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning. The role is primarily a backend/DevOps position.
